CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 14-17 A variety of good donor moieties , including oligothiophenes , 18-23 carbazole , 24 benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene , 25-27 and dithienosilole , 14,28 have been demonstrated as useful for low band gap polymers ; good acceptor moieties including thieno- [3,4-b]thiophenes substituted with electron - withdrawing groups , 29-31 N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione , 25,28 benzothiadiazole , 24,32 and 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione 33-36 have been developed.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| oligothiophenes |
| carbazole |
| benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| dithienosilole |
| thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes |
| N-alkylthieno[3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione |
| benzothiadiazole |
| 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| oligothiophenes |
| carbazole |
| benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| dithienosilole |
| thieno-[3,4-b]thiophene |
| benzothiadiazole |

The following entities were removed:

* N-alkylthieno[3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (not a material name)
* 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione (not a material name)
